meanings.definition: Covered with paint that has been applied excessively.
meanings.sent1: The old chair looked messy with its overpainted surface.
meanings.sent2: The artist regretted the overpainted details on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The overpainted walls made the room seem like a rainbow explosion.
meanings.sent4: Her face was like an overpainted mask, hiding her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The overpainted fence glowed in the sunlight, attracting attention.

meanings.sent1: She overpainted the mistake on the wall with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti was overpainted by the city workers to clean up the wall.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overpainted the important message with blue paint.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to overpaint the entire mural to start fresh.
meanings.sent5: The overpainted lines on the road confused the drivers, leading to traffic jams.

meanings.sent1: The overpainted doll looked like it had makeup caked on its face.
meanings.sent2: The overpainted car had layers of colors that clashed horribly.
meanings.sent3: The overpainted picture seemed to be drowning in a sea of colors.
meanings.sent4: Her nails were overpainted with so many colors, they looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The overpainted house stood out in the neighborhood, drawing mixed reactions.
